mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADM_NOTICE (started_at, ended_at, title, content, writer, is_popup, created_at, modified_at) VALUES (#{startedAt}, #{endedAt}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{popup}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, started_at, ended_at, title, content, writer, created_at, modified_at, CASE WHEN is_popup = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS popupString, is_popup FROM ADM_NOTICE ORDER BY notice_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ADM_NOTICE SET title = #{notice.title}, content = #{notice.content}, started_at = #{notice.startedAt}, ended_at = #{notice.endedAt}, is_popup = #{notice.popup}, modified_at = NOW() WHERE notice_no = #{notice.noticeNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE type_code = 'NOTI' AND target_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (type_code, target_no, original_name, saved_name) VALUES (#{typeCode}, #{targetNo}, #{originalName}, #{savedName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE type_code = 'NOTI' AND target_no = #{noticeNo}
SELECT n.*, a.* FROM ADM_NOTICE n LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT a ON a.target_no = n.notice_no AND a.type_code = 'NOTI' WHERE n.notice_no = #{noticeNo}
